message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
You can have the smaller share, but I'll still get the better deal!
I'll give you a slightly better deal, but I'm not going to get taken advantage of!
I'll meet you in the middle, but I'm still not giving up the upper hand!
I'm willing to compromise, but I think we should split it evenly again. Let's try to find a middle ground!
